key_risks: Regulatory and political risks due to potential changes in student loan regulations
Economic sensitivity, including interest rate fluctuations and employment rate changes
Borrower complaints and servicing issues leading to reputational damage
Competition from federal student loan programs offering lower interest rates
controversies: Over 1,991 complaints filed with the CFPB between 2012 and 2023
Investigation by the New York attorney general’s office in 2007
social_issues: Criticism over handling of borrower complaints and servicing issues
Growing student debt crisis in the U.S.
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny and potential financial penalties due to servicing practices
